Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp. Clay near fine light brown; cream slip.
Curator's comments: Name Marsyas. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 28a, 20. From same die as Pergamon 481.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0797)
